BoolProperty.Name: MSVCErrorReport
BoolProperty.Description: Report errors which Visual Studio can use to parse for file and line information. (-fdiagnostics-format=msvc)

StringProperty.Name: OutputFile
StringProperty.Description: Overrides the default name and location of the program that the linker creates. (-o)

BoolProperty.Name: Version
BoolProperty.Description: Print the version of the tool used for linking. (-Wl,--version)

BoolProperty.Name: Trace
BoolProperty.Description: The name of the input files as they are processed. (-Wl,--trace)

StringListProperty.Name: TraceSymbols
StringListProperty.Description: Print the list of files in which a symbol appears. (-Wl,--trace-symbol=)

BoolProperty.Name: PrintMap
BoolProperty.Description: Print a link map to the standard output. A link map provides information about the link. (-Wl,--print-map)

BoolProperty.Name: IncrementalLink
BoolProperty.Description: Enables incremental linking in the linker.

StringProperty.Name: SysRoot
StringProperty.Description: Folder path to the root directory for headers and libraries.

BoolProperty.Name: OptimizeforMemory
BoolProperty.Description: Optimize for memory usage, by rereading the symbol tables as necessary.

StringListProperty.Name: SharedLibrarySearchPath
StringListProperty.Description: Allows the user to populate the shared library search path. (-rpath-link=path)

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalLibraryDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Allows the user to override the library path. (-L folder).

StringProperty.Name: GccToolChain
StringProperty.Description: Folder path to the GCC toolchain.

StringListProperty.Name: IgnoreSpecificDefaultLibraries
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more names of default libraries to ignore.

BoolProperty.Name: IgnoreDefaultLibraries
BoolProperty.Description: Ignore default libraries and only search libraries explicitly specified.

StringListProperty.Name: ForceUndefineSymbolReferences
StringListProperty.Description: Force symbol to be entered in the output file as an undefined symbol. (-u symbol --undefined=symbol)

StringListProperty.Name: LibraryDependencies
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies additional libraries to be added to the end of the linker command line. (-lFILE)

EnumProperty.Name: DebuggerSymbolInformation
EnumProperty.Description: Debugger symbol information from the output file.

StringProperty.Name: GenerateMapFile
StringProperty.Description: Create a map file with the specified name. (-Map=)

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalDependencies
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies additional items to add to the linker command line.
